videoSnippet.title: The Immortal b4 Game! || Robson vs Xiong || U.S. Championship(2023)
videoSnippet.description:
Now YOU Can Play against Alireza! Here's how: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9KS5bu7v0E
Download Mproov and Improve Your Chess Today! https://app.mproov.me/AgadYouTube1

Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

Photos by Lennart Ootes

Robson, Ray (2699) - Xiong, Jeffery (2693)
U.S. Championship (chess24.com) [5] 2023.10.10
C43 Petrov, modern attack, Symmetrical variation

1.e4 e5 2.Nf3 Nf6 3.d4 Nxe4 4.Bd3 d5 5.Nxe5 Nd7 6.O-O Nxe5 7.dxe5 Nc5 8.Be3 Be7 9.f4 Nxd3 10.Qxd3 g6 11.Nc3 c6 12.Ne2 O-O 13.Ng3 Bh4 14.Bc5 Re8 15.f5 Rxe5 16.fxg6 hxg6 17.Bd4 Re8 18.Rxf7 Kxf7 19.Rf1+ Ke7 20.Qxg6 Be6 21.Qg7+ Kd6 22.Be5+ Kc5 23.Bd4+ Kd6 24.Be5+ Kc5 25.Bc7 Bf6 26.Rxf6 Rg8 27.Ne4+ Kb5 28.a4+ Kb4 29.Qh6

00:00 Hello Everyone!

The 2023 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring some of the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $250,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com
